mapper.select: SELECT * FROM store a INNER JOIN release b ON a.product_code = b.product_code INNER JOIN box_quantity f ON b.box_code = f.box_code INNER JOIN category c on a.category_code = c.category_code INNER JOIN account d on a.account_code = d.account_code INNER JOIN product e on a.product_code = e.product_code INNER JOIN department g ON b.department_code = g.department_code
